text: The Lucas Oil Complete Engine Treatment 200 is a ARCA Menards Series race held during Speedweeks at Daytona International Speedway in February. It was previously known as the Daytona ARCA 200. ==List of winners== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- ! rowspan="2"|Year ! rowspan="2"|Date ! rowspan="2"|Driver ! rowspan="2"|Manufacturer ! colspan="2"|Race distance ! rowspan="2"|Race time ! rowspan="2"|Average speed (mph) |- !
